post.body: What is happening to need swears?
Much love to you, Mark. Glad to know you are okay!
WE PLAN ON HELPING AS BEST AS WE CAN!
I can donate some cash!
Link, please? I can't seem to get the one I found to work. D:
!!! REALLY?!
Do you know how/why the protesting turned violent? By associating violence and homosexuality, reporters are going to kill us.
Brinner most certainly is breakfast for dinner! :D
I CAN'T STOP PLAYING POKEMON NOW THAT I FOUND OUT HOW TO PLAY THE OLD GAMES ON MY COMPUTER! :D :D :D
DOOD! YOU HAVE TO GO! THAT SOUNDS TOO GREAT TO MISS!
Bon anniversaire! :D
I near the internet right now?
I'm in! ILY!
Thank you, and tell Craig I said thanks too! :D
I just ran into my ex-girlfriend from high school at KFC! OMG! MAYDAY!
I can has a haircut? Yes, today is a good day for a change.
Why am I watching the Tinkerbell movie that I recorded yesterday? Have I really lost all of my marbles?
I feel so alive and well. Today was meant to happen.
I just lost the game.
Smell that? I just burnt 44 peanut butter cookies. -__-
I am in love with the ads in Men's Fitness magazines. ;D
An a better note: my dog smells like bacon. :)
I come home and have to clean my room!? RLY?! D:
I am so excited for @hidedontseek! :D
I can't say that I've ever wanted a hug greater than what I do at this moment right now...
Anyone still figuring out the possible Pay-pal situation?
Just left a message on Mark's cell phone, letting him know that we're here for him.
Gross guys always get the girl, and the good guys are non-existent. The world is doomed.
This moment is so juicy; I can almost taste the FAIL. XD
Rollerskatin' as Clark Kent tonight. TGFShozu! :D
Brinner tastes great, and I wish that I had my laptop right now. D:
ILY MICHAEL IAN BLACK! :D
I smile too much says the Hot Topic worker that knows me too well. :)
I wish that more people would be down to text with me at midnight some nights. =P
CLICK ON EGG SONG! - http://tinyurl.com/4lf587
Sadness - http://hatecrimereports.org/
I love the movie "A Lot Like Love." Ashton Kutcher is so much cooler than his Kelso counterpart. -__-
Ew! WHY I GOT TO GET GROSS PICSHUR MESSAGES FROM PEOPLE I DON'T KNOW?! D:
DUDE, THE FREAKING POWERPUFF GIRLS ARE ON! I totally haven't seen this show in years.
Think of life like a TV show - it'll go by faster.
I can never resist watching The Wizard of Oz when it is on television. I will always be able to relate to that film.

R U VOTING 4 TEH BUZZNET AWARDZ?! DO IT!!! - http://tinyurl.com/999e6h
sleep is good. z___z
Tyson is a GOD. I kinda forgot why I was here, so no one get mad if my photos suck. Y/Y?
If the boys of 3OH!3 were any more sexually suggestive on stage, their show would literally be porn.
As @Miseryxchord once said: You have to pretend like you are exactly where you have to be. :)
As @Misery once said: You have to pretend like you are exactly where you have to be.
A boy just pretended to faint and was allowed entry. I am just about ready to do the very same!! XD
My media pass has a 4 on it, but the lady says that I need a 6. ORLY? That jerk is NOT keeping from AAR, and that is that!
Forgot to tell you all that Fall Out Boy is performing on Jimmy Kimmel Live! tonight! :)
Night: the window was down, the back crowded, and he was driving. I remember how nice it feels to be a passenger, his friend...
Watching these Desperate Housewives reruns make fall in love with Shawn Pyfrom all over again...
Forcing myself to sleep - my eyes are heavy, these fingers are sore, and I do not remember how these words used to go. Click heels! Click!
